description: Review our list of 10 safe and natural ways to reduce stretch marks while at home.
cleaned_text: Stretch marks are small scars which are caused by growth spurts during puberty, sudden weight gain or a quick increase in muscle mass during exercise and can affect both men and women. Chances are that you would like to reduce your stretch marks, despite them being praised as "tiger stripes" or "stripes of honor". - There are no proven treatments to completely remove them. - Some natural remedies can help you reduce their appearance. - Stretch marks are most associated with women but can also affect men.
